19cc4e42-39bb-41f9-b9de-9f2940eed6a2.overall_goal: Clean the car interior using a mop and manage/organize the cleaning supplies.

sub_events.name: Prepare and pick up mop
sub_events.description: Grab the mop-stick from the floor to begin cleaning.

sub_events.name: Clean and temporarily stow items in car
sub_events.description: Sweep the car interior, handle the door, and place or put cleaning items inside/on the car.

sub_events.name: Retrieve cloth from storage
sub_events.description: Move to a cabinet, open it, and pick up the cloth.

sub_events.name: Move to wall and get mop-stick
sub_events.description: Go to the wall with the cloth and pick the mop-stick from the wall.

fbf4150a-27d2-48a4-956f-b4f85ecde465.overall_goal: Temporarily shut down and stow a laptop, then bring it back, reconnect power and peripherals, and resume using it.

sub_events.name: Finish work and power down
sub_events.description: Type to complete tasks or enter input, then press the laptop's power/button to initiate shutdown.

sub_events.name: Close and stow laptop
sub_events.description: Close the laptop, unplug the charger, and put the laptop away for storage.

sub_events.name: Retrieve and position laptop
sub_events.description: Pick the laptop up, place it on the table, and open it to prepare for use.

sub_events.name: Reconnect power and set up peripherals
sub_events.description: Pick up and insert the charger into the laptop and socket, then pick up and place the external keyboard on the table.

sub_events.name: Resume work and interact with mouse
sub_events.description: Type on the keyboard, set up the mouse, move it, and click to interact with the system.

954c2f61-64ad-4c89-a26f-ec4547a65fab.overall_goal: Prepare an onion and get a pot of water heating on the cooker (preparing to cook the onion).

sub_events.name: Wash and prepare pot
sub_events.description: Turn on water, wash the onion, handle the pot and fill it with water under the tap.

sub_events.name: Position and slice the onion
sub_events.description: Place the onion on the cutting board, hold and slice it with the knife, then set the knife down and release the onion.

sub_events.name: Set pot on cooker and start heating
sub_events.description: Place the filled pot on the cooker and turn the cooker on to begin heating.

sub_events.name: Final onion handling (peel/cut)
sub_events.description: Pick up the knife again, hold the onion, and peel it (final preparation steps).

277b18de-4ad9-4c09-970b-91fcea05097d.overall_goal: Manage tools and perform maintenance on a wheel/bolt assembly â€” preparing/handling tools, tightening bolts, and removing the wheel.

sub_events.name: Gather and arrange tools
sub_events.description: Select and place individual tools (wrench, plier, spanner) for use or staging.

sub_events.name: Pack tools into box and close
sub_events.description: Hold tools and put them into a box, set them down, and cover the box with a lid.

sub_events.name: Tighten bolt(s) with wrench/spanner
sub_events.description: Use the wrench and spanner to position and tighten nuts/bolts, then set tools down on the table.

sub_events.name: Handle wheel and finalize fastening
sub_events.description: Bring and adjust the wheel, take it off, and perform final tightening of nuts with the wrench.

e9be1118-a5cf-4431-b2e8-e3edcfa9f949.overall_goal: Assemble and fasten a wood piece to a wood panel by positioning parts, clamping, drilling pilot holes, and inserting screws.

sub_events.name: Initial screw fastening
sub_events.description: Pick up a screwdriver and screw, position the screw on the wood and drive it in, then set the screwdriver down and release the screw.

sub_events.name: Clamp placement and removal
sub_events.description: Pick up a clamp, position and tighten it on the wood, then loosen and remove the clamp.

sub_events.name: Position parts and secure with clamp
sub_events.description: Move the wood to the workbench, pick up and align the wood piece, then pick up and position a clamp on the wood piece and tighten it to hold parts together.

sub_events.name: Drill pilot holes
sub_events.description: Pick up the drill, hold the workpieces with the other hand and drill holes (repeat as needed), then withdraw and set the drill down and release the held piece.

sub_events.name: Final screw preparation
sub_events.description: Pick up the screwdriver and another screw, and position the screw on the wood piece in preparation for final fastening.

f5c27b88-a3eb-4290-9102-0307c2809241.overall_goal: Organize and clean books on a bookshelf, including removing dust and inspecting/reshelving individual books

sub_events.name: Arrange and place book
sub_events.description: Prepare a book and position it on the shelf (arranging, placing and aligning)

sub_events.name: Remove and clean shelf
sub_events.description: Take a book off the shelf and clean the bookshelf surface using a brush and rag

sub_events.name: Inspect and reshelve books
sub_events.description: Handle, inspect, move and reshelve books (moving between shelf and floor, checking, and removing covers/items)

97ad4e58-c64f-47e3-8d84-6aad38bdfbc8.overall_goal: Secure bolts on a machine by first adjusting/seating the machine with a hammer, then positioning and tightening bolts with a screwdriver.

sub_events.name: Seat/adjust machine with hammer
sub_events.description: Pick up the hammer, steady the machine, strike the machine to seat/adjust it, and set the hammer down.

sub_events.name: Install and tighten first bolt
sub_events.description: Pick up a bolt, position it on the machine and release it, pick up a screwdriver, hold the bolt with the other hand, tighten the bolt with the screwdriver, release the hand and place the screwdriver down.

sub_events.name: Install and tighten second bolt
sub_events.description: Repeat the bolt installation: pick up and position the bolt, release it, pick up the screwdriver, hold the bolt with the other hand, tighten the bolt with the screwdriver, and release the bolt.

a20c2c22-cc2c-487e-8041-f0b33f4845ca.overall_goal: Attach and secure a piece of fabric onto furniture by cutting it to size, applying glue, fastening with nails, and trimming the excess.

sub_events.name: Prepare and cut fabric
sub_events.description: Pick up tools and hold the fabric, then cut the fabric to the required size.

sub_events.name: Apply adhesive
sub_events.description: Pick up and apply glue to the fabric and smooth it to ensure adhesion.

sub_events.name: Fasten fabric to furniture
sub_events.description: Pick up hammer and nails and drive nails into the furniture to secure the fabric, adjusting as needed.

sub_events.name: Final trimming
sub_events.description: Use scissors to trim away excess fabric and put tools away.

860980fb-f992-4bb1-8a46-b644f58090e2.overall_goal: Prepare and assemble a folded paper piece by aligning a metal board, folding the paper, attaching cardboard, and applying glue with a brush.

sub_events.name: Positioning template/weight
sub_events.description: Place and align a metal board onto the paper to serve as a template or stabilizing weight.

sub_events.name: Paper preparation and folding
sub_events.description: Pick up the paper, perform one or more folds with adjustments, and set it back down in the desired configuration.

sub_events.name: Attach and secure cardboard
sub_events.description: Pick up a piece of cardboard, place and attach it onto the prepared paper, then press it to ensure contact.

sub_events.name: Apply adhesive
sub_events.description: Pick up a brush, dip it into glue, hold the paper steady, and apply glue onto the paper/cardboard assembly.

15d4a2c1-1cb8-4b76-a66a-adb20b7e96cb.overall_goal: Examine and inspect a card on a table by tapping and repeatedly picking it up to check it, then putting it back.

sub_events.name: Initial probing
sub_events.description: Person taps and touches the card while it lies on the table to interact with or orient it before handling.

sub_events.name: First pick-up and check
sub_events.description: Person picks the card up with one hand, inspects or checks it, then puts it back on the table.

sub_events.name: Second pick-up and check (repeat)
sub_events.description: After another tap on the table, the person again picks the card up, examines it, and returns it to the table.

sub_events.name: Third pick-up and check (repeat)
sub_events.description: A final pick-up, inspection, and put-down of the card is performed.
